product_summary: The AI Voice Detector is a tool that can identify if an audio was generated by an AI voice or by a human voice. It can detect from all voice cloning platforms, in multiple languages, and can be used as a browser extension.
product_pros: Detects from all voice cloning platforms
Integrated feature to remove background noise
Can detect in short audios (less than 7 seconds)
Can be used as a browser extension
product_cons: May not be able to detect all AI-generated voices
Requires an internet connection to use
Can be time-consuming to analyze long audio files
May not be able to detect AI-generated voices that are very similar to human voices
May not be able to detect AI-generated voices that have been edited or processed

product_usecases.details: Individuals can use the AI Voice Detector to analyze voice messages and calls they receive to determine whether the audio comes from an AI-generated voice or not.
Businesses can use the AI Voice Detector to help their employees verify the authenticity of all received audio messages, calls, or meetings.
Law enforcement can use the AI Voice Detector to investigate cases of fraud, identity theft, and other crimes involving AI-generated voices.
Researchers can use the AI Voice Detector to study the development and use of AI-generated voices.
Educators can use the AI Voice Detector to teach students about the dangers of AI-generated voices and how to identify them.

product_toolfor.details: The AI Voice Detector is a valuable tool for individuals who want to protect themselves from AI voice scams.
The AI Voice Detector is a valuable tool for businesses who want to protect themselves from AI voice fraud.
The AI Voice Detector is a valuable tool for law enforcement who investigate cases involving AI-generated voices.
The AI Voice Detector is a valuable tool for researchers who study the development and use of AI-generated voices.
The AI Voice Detector is a valuable tool for educators who teach students about the dangers of AI-generated voices.

product_pricing: Based on your usage and number of users within your company, we can provide you with the exact pricing model to use our API
